machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; IUM1 Start Code
G28 ; Auto Home extruder
G1 Z15 F100 ; Linear Move Z15 axis F100mm/m speed
M107 ; Turn off fan
G90 ; Absolute positioning
M82 ; Extruder in absolute mode
M104 T0 S210 ; Warm up, hot end to 210c without waiting
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position
M109 T0 S210 ; Wait for temperature of 210

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; IUM1 End Code
G1 X0 Y0 Z130 ; Get extruder out of way
M107 ; Turn off fan
; Disable all extruder
G91 ; Relative positioning
T0
G1 E-1 ; Reduce filament pressure
M104 T0 S0
G90 ; Absolute positioning
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder position
M140 S0 ; Disable heated bed
M84 ; Turn steppers off
